speaker: Sarah
text: Ugh, this is so boring. I can't believe we have to learn this stuff.

speaker: Mary
text: I know it might not be everyone's cup of tea, but I find it intriguing. I kind of enjoy coding in Javascript.

speaker: Sarah
text: Seriously, who cares about web development? I'd rather be doing something else.

speaker: Mary
text: It's okay if it's not your thing, Sarah. We all have different interests.

speaker: Mary
text: I can't wait to get started on this project! I'm going to create something cool with Javascript.

speaker: Sarah
text: Good luck with that. I don't see how this will be fun at all.

speaker: Mary
text: Ugh, why can't I get this to look right?

speaker: Sarah
text: Your HTML and CSS aren't set up properly. That's why it's not working.

speaker: Mary
text: Wow, Sarah, you're incredible at this! You made it look so much better.

speaker: Sarah
text: It was nothing, really. I've messed around with this stuff before.

speaker: Mary
text: Thank you, Sarah. I wouldn't have been able to do this without your help.

speaker: Sarah
text: See? Web development can be pretty cool when you know what you're doing.

speaker: Sarah
text: This is actually kind of fun. I never realized how creative you can be with web design.

speaker: Mary
text: I told you! You have a natural knack for this, Sarah. You should consider exploring it further.

speaker: Teacher
text: This is an outstanding website! Great work, Mary and Sarah.

speaker: Sarah
text: You know, Mary, I never thought I'd enjoy web development, but working on this project with you has changed my perspective.

speaker: Mary
text: I'm glad I could show you how fun it can be. We make a great team, Sarah.

speaker: Sarah
text: Thanks for believing in me, Mary. I never thought I'd discover my passion for this without you.

speaker: Mary
text: And thank you for being patient with me and helping me grow too. We both found something we love, and it's all because of each other.
